attributes.review: this app is straight out of my nightmares... first off once i open the app i am greeted with mr. cheetos disturbing horrifying smile. then as i use the app, i find it is filled with lies!! not even a week after i downloaded this app my fridge and microwave were hacked. i got a notification from the app today and crashed my car. this app is ruining my eyesight and my life. please take it off.
attributes.title: app of my nightmares

attributes.review: AWFUL JUST A DISGRACE TO THE COUNTRY ! like this needs to be taken down right now like i don’t understand why this is even an app. like i saw a horrifying image of a cheeto puff and i threw up . therefore this app should be taken down.

I downloaded this app to binge on my favorite shows but instead there was a SCARY ORANGE YELLING NONSENSE AT ME. I want to sue this app because now I am in therapy with PTSD and cannot function properly. Do NOT download if you value your life!!!
attributes.title: Worst experience of my life 😭

attributes.review: Well I downloaded it hoping it was going to be good and just see the horrors of him PG13 but it was horrible I’m never going to be able to sleep again
attributes.title: Just a waist.

attributes.review: I downloaded it and it just crashes and when it doesn’t crash it’s super slow and barely works.
attributes.title: Defective app

attributes.review: This was the worst app I have ever had. I saw the orangutan speaking and I just lost it. 🤢🤢🤢🤮🤮🤮🤮🤧🤧🤧 how is this even possible. Who would let this Cheeto  have his own app. This is unbelievable and unacceptable. Do not download this app

i was just sweeping my pool when a giant cheeto man appeared out of nowhere! he was yelling at me to vote for trump. he proceeded to kick me in the stomach and claimed to own this app. he then used his rather ugly toupee to whack me in the face until i was put in the hospital. i have several injuries and will be needing therapy. thank the gods that my pool is okay and so is my broom. i will now be sweeping my pool with adult supervision just in case another cheeto man appears.😓😓
attributes.title: no❤️

attributes.review: Not quite sure why I can leave a review for less than 1 star because that’s what I would like. Negative stars should become a thing🥰
attributes.title: One Star

attributes.review: I don’t want to even explain but let me say this I can’t with this app 3 reasons. 1. TRUMP 2. All the trouble USA been through with HIM & last but certainly not least 3. Why is people is talking about Trump 2020 noooooo
It keeps glitches it’s a horrible app it does not work keeps giving me ads for things I don’t have the slightest interest in
attributes.title: It’s just terrible
